text: A photo of Nicolas Cage is sweeping the internet after he posed with Kazakhstan First Lady Sara Nazarbayeva Sunday. Cage was in the country ’ s capital city of Astana for the 13th Eurasia International Film Festival, reported the Astana Times. Also Read : Sean Spicer Took a Mini - Fridge From Junior Staffers and Twitter Loves It In the photo, Cage is pictured wearing a traditional Kazakh hat and robe, and it has Twitter users wondering what is going on with the Oscar winner. As one observer put it, “ Nicholas Cage in Kazakhstan is the picture you didn ’ t know you wanted but you need. ” Others on Twitter used the photo to liken it to Russia news. “ In the new ‘ National Treasure ’, Nicholas Cage investigates a urine stain on the back of the Constitution,
